channel.title: Ampere Revolve on Portrait of Pirates - The final guide of figures
channel.description: Recent content in Ampere Revolve on Portrait of Pirates - The final guide of figures

item.description: Name: Roronoa Zoro P.O.P Edition Z Character: Roronoa Zoro Category: Edition Z Sculptor: Ampere (Revolve) Official price: 9240 ¥ Preorder date: Oct-13 Release date: Feb-14 Height: 21 (cm) Weight: 1440 (g) Box size: 35.5 x 30.5 x 27.0 (cm) Bonus: La fecha de release inicialmente era 02/2014. Se retrasó a 03/2014.

Name: Bartolomeo P.O.P Limited Edition Character: Bartolomeo Category: Limited Edition Sculptor: Ampere (Revolve) Official price: 9990 ¥ Preorder date: May-14 Release date: Sep-14 Reeditions: Mar-15 Height: 24 (cm) Weight: 976 (g) Box size: 18.0 x 33.0 x 23.0 (cm) Bonus: Por aniversario de Megatrea Shop hubo una reedición con reservas entre el 03-23/02/2015 por 9.990¥. La figura se empezó a repartir en 03/2015.

Name: Bartolomeo P.O.P Limited Edition Kai Ver. Character: Bartolomeo Category: Limited Edition Sculptor: Ampere (Revolve) Official price: 11000 ¥ Preorder date: Jun-16 Release date: Oct-16 Height: 24 (cm) Weight: 904 (g) Box size: 31.2 x 25.5 x 18.5 (cm)
